properties.description: We worked with Riverworks in New Hampshire for this lifesized print made from a PVC-free polyester material that is degradable in 70 years. The adhesive backing is phthalate-free, a major plus for our environment, and the paper backing is 100% recyclable. This decal is printed using eco-solvent, low VOC inks, and these materials have all passed the Euro-regulation REACH test. We were determined to present the best possible option, and were pleased to find a way to produce this product without the overuse of harmful chemicals or plastics.
properties.title: Printed Decal

properties.description: We worked with Riverworks in New Hampshire for this lifesized low impact wall decal.
properties.title: The Manifesto Decal
